maze_solver_v1.description: A robust pathfinding tool using the A* search algorithm, designed to navigate complex maze-like environments efficiently. Includes extensive debugging.

extra_impassable_coordinates.description: A JSON string of a list of additional [x, y] coordinates to treat as impassable.

object_finder.description: Finds a specific map object by its ID and returns its coordinates.

pathfinder_v5.description: An enhanced pathfinding tool that reads map markers to account for off-screen objects, making it reliable for long-distance pathing. It can also find paths to tiles adjacent to impassable destinations. Version 5 fixes a bug where a marker on the start tile would cause a pathing failure.

extra_impassable_coordinates.description: A JSON string of a list of additional [x, y] coordinates to treat as impassable.
